name: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: paneer, tomato, butter, cream, spices, ginger, garlic
instructions: Cook tomato, garlic, ginger with spices. Blend to paste. Add paneer and cream. Simmer.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, soy sauce, garlic, ginger
instructions: Stir fry vegetables in oil with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and cook until tender.

name: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: potato, cauliflower, onion, tomato, turmeric, cumin
instructions: Saute onion, add spices, then potato and cauliflower. Cook until soft.

name: Veggie Wrap
ingredients: tortilla, lettuce, tomato, cucumber, hummus, bell pepper
instructions: Spread hummus on tortilla, add veggies, wrap tightly and serve.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Cook tomatoes with onion and garlic, blend, simmer, and add cream before serving.

name: Chickpea Salad
ingredients: chickpeas, cucumber, tomato, lemon juice, olive oil, herbs
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and toss with lemon and olive oil.

name: Paneer Sandwich
ingredients: bread, paneer, onion, tomato, green chutney
instructions: Spread chutney on bread, layer paneer and veggies, grill or toast.

name: Sweet Corn Chaat
ingredients: boiled corn, lemon, onion, chili, salt, chaat masala
instructions: Mix all ingredients and serve warm or cold.

name: Mixed Veg Pulao
ingredients: rice, carrot, peas, beans, cumin, onion, spices
instructions: Sauté veggies with spices, add rice and water, cook until done.

name: Spinach Pasta
ingredients: pasta, spinach, garlic, cream, olive oil
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic and spinach, mix with cream. Combine with pasta.
